mapper.insert: insert into sys_user (organization_id, username, password, salt, role_ids, locked) values (#{user.organizationId}, #{user.username}, #{user.password},#{user.salt}, #{user.roleIdsStr}, #{user.locked})
mapper.update: update sys_user set organization_id = #{user.organizationId}, username = #{user.username}, password = #{user.password}, salt = #{user.salt}, role_ids = #{user.roleIdsStr}, locked = #{user.locked} where id= #{user.id}
mapper.select: SELECT t.id, t.organization_id, t.username, t.password, t.salt, t.role_ids, t.locked, s.name as organization_name FROM sys_user t LEFT JOIN sys_organization s ON s.id = t.organization_id WHERE t.id = #{userId}
